Event.Message:
A %1 Wireless Group Policy was applied to your computer.
Wireless Group Policy Name: %2%3 Applied settings: AutoConfig Enabled: %4 Show Denied Networks: %5 Wireless Group Policy Summary Profiles applied: %6%7 Profiles not applied: %8%9
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyNamePlaceholder" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AutoConfig Enabled" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Show Denied networks" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Profiles applied" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Profiles applied placeholder" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Profiles not applied" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Profiles not applied placeholder" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Wireless Group Policy has been removed from your computer.

A %1 Wireless Group Policy couldn't be applied to your computer.
Wireless Group Policy Name: %2%3 Reason Code: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyNamePlaceholder" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ReasonCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
